attributes.action: Supermarket workers given the option to be Furloughed. Not forced to work.
attributes.additional_details: Does this not come under the human rights Act? We’re all humans but some discriminated against because of where we are employed.
attributes.background:
Supermarket workers to be given the option to be furloughed. Not forced to work. 
As other retailers have been Furloughed why are we being treated differently and made to put our lives at risk in order to pay bills whilst others sit at home risk free receiving the same income to pay their bills.
